name: Witlock the Wizard: Spell Gone Wrong
name_original: Witlock the Wizard: Spell Gone Wrong
description:
READ HERE: Controls are displayed wrong in game due to rushing for Game Jam correct controls:

- Move : WASD
- Rotate Q and E
- Scale: Scroll bar
- Look around: Right click and Drag

A Spell gone wrong! Witlock has found himself transported to another dimension and needs your way out! Using telekinetic powers and a clever mind use the Block Gremlins to find a way out.
